nodes.text: The 6-B hover train was a repulsorcraft speeder train used for mass-transit on Coruscant during the Clone Wars.

During the Clone Wars, Padawan Ahsoka Tano pursued the criminal Cassie Cryar onto a train of this kind. As the vehicle traveled through electromagnetic tubes, the chase continued on top of the train, until Cryar smashed her way into the passenger compartments. She was eventually subdued at a train stop by Jedi Master Tera Sinube.
